医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AI 模型通过胸部 X 光准确评估肺功能使用基于深度学习的模型进行胸部 X 光检查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/AI-model-accurately-estimates-pulmonary-function-from-chest-x-rays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/AI-model-accurately-estimates-pulmonary-function-from-chest-x-rays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30d4afa2-c0a8-4d9f-9bf4-4a5a9c24eb06 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 08:06:00 -0400 AI model accurately estimates pulmonary function from chest x-rays
补充山茱萸对不同心脏代谢结果的影响《营养》杂志最近的一项荟萃​​分析检查了最近对山茱萸（Cornus mas L.）的研究，以寻找其心脏代谢益处的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/The-effect-of-supplementation-with-cornelian-cherry-on- Different-cardiometabolic-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/The-effect-of-supplementation-with-cornelian-cherry-on- Different-cardiometabolic-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ec360a5-e1b5-4289-871b-faa80fa3cd50 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 08:06:00 -0400 The effect of supplementation with cornelian cherry on different cardiometabolic outcomes
儿童自闭症谱系障碍的古菌、真菌、病毒以及细菌、功能制造者研究人员通过对儿童粪便样本进行宏基因组测序，研究了多界肠道微生物组成分和功能标记与自闭症谱系障碍之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Archaeal-fungal-viral-as-well-as-bacterial-function-makers-for-autism-spectrum-disorder-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Archaeal-fungal-viral-as-well-as-bacterial-function-makers-for-autism-spectrum-disorder-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31479ba8-dc7f-4a87-bc8a-5bc2ef8bec45 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 07:46:00 -0400 Archaeal, fungal, viral, as well as bacterial, functional makers for autism spectrum disorder in children
芬兰正在为农场工人提供禽流感疫苗。一些专家表示，美国也应该这样做。随着禽流感在美国奶牛中传播，兽医和研究人员注意到芬兰为有感染风险的农场工人接种疫苗的举措。他们想知道为什么他们的政府不采取同样的行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Finland-is-offering-farmworkers-bird-flu-shots-Some-experts-say-the-US-should-too.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Finland-is-offering-farmworkers-bird-flu-shots-Some-experts-say-the-US-should-too.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51bc2599-7f38-455a-8db0-fa3c15c7d53a Thu, 11 Jul 2024 07:31:57 -0400 Finland is offering farmworkers bird flu shots. Some experts say the US should, too.
科罗拉多州像红色州一样取消了医疗补助计划的参保人数，这让穷人权益倡导者感到震惊自美国政府取消大流行期间将人们从健康保险计划中剔除的限制以来，科罗拉多州是取消医疗补助受益人比例最高的 10 个州之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Colorado-dropped-Medicaid-enrollees-as-red-states-have-alarming-advocates-for-the-poor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Colorado-dropped-Medicaid-enrollees-as-red-states-have-alarming-advocates-for-the-poor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c56c15f0-5886-44ad-9b4a-3a7e52508093 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 07:24:45 -0400 Colorado dropped Medicaid enrollees as red states have, alarming advocates for the poor
研究人员发现癌症和妊娠中抑制免疫系统的共同分子机制研究人员阐明了癌症和妊娠中共有的免疫耐受机制，重点关注免疫检查点蛋白作为肿瘤胎儿免疫耐受检查点的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Researchers-identify-shared-molecular-mechanism-in-cancer-and-pregnancy-that-suppresses-immune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Researchers-identify-shared-molecular-mechanism-in-cancer-and-pregnancy-that-suppresses-immune-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a7294a5-e70a-4f83-9f1a-22d7d7cc612d Thu, 11 Jul 2024 07:17:00 -0400 Researchers identify shared molecular mechanism in cancer and pregnancy that suppresses immune system
COVID-19 大流行后，儿童因精神健康问题住院治疗有何变化？加拿大 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 大流行之前和期间年轻人心理健康状况的发生率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/How-did-hospitalizations-for-mental-health-conditions-in-children-change-following-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/How-did-hospitalizations-for-mental-health-conditions-in-children-change-following-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=deb7f1a8-b126-47c9-8747-a2669a9ca1cd Thu, 11 Jul 2024 07:04:00 -0400 How did hospitalizations for mental health conditions in children change following the COVID-19 pandemic?
拥抱无塑料七月：Bedfont® Scientific Limited 对可持续未来的承诺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Embracing-Plastic-Free-July-The-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Commitment-to-a-Sustainable-Future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Embracing-Plastic-Free-July-The-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Commitment-to-a-Sustainable-Future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a475c16-e974-4b44-91cc-cf3aea6c5938 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 05:12:00 -0400 Embracing Plastic Free July: The Bedfont® Scientific Limited Commitment to a Sustainable Future.
研究显示肝脏的防御机制阻碍慢性乙型肝炎的免疫力在慢性乙型肝炎中，肝脏含有可以破坏乙型肝炎病毒感染细胞但不活跃的免疫细胞。慕尼黑工业大学 (TUM) 的一个团队发现，肝脏中的细胞血管会启动一个“睡眠计时器”，从而关闭免疫细胞。针对这一机制可能是免疫疗法的起点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Livers-defense-mechanism-hinders-immunity-in-chronic-hepatitis-B-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Livers-defense-mechanism-hinders-immunity-in-chronic-hepatitis-B-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e27fec68-0705-46e1-89b1-54c4d3a00121 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 02:45:20 -0400 Liver's defense mechanism hinders immunity in chronic hepatitis B, study reveals
先进成像揭示 AMD 隐性视力丧失波恩大学医院 (UKB) 与波恩大学合作的新研究首次表明，年龄相关性黄斑变性 (AMD) 患者的某些早期变化可能导致可测量的局部视力丧失。这一发现可能有助于改善老年患者这种眼病的治疗和监测，否则这种眼病会慢慢导致中枢性失明，并有助于测试新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Advanced-imaging-reveals-hidden-vision-loss-in-AMD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Advanced-imaging-reveals-hidden-vision-loss-in-AMD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10ea4d14-fcfc-467d-8515-5a94890d4c98 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 02:05:40 -0400 Advanced imaging reveals hidden vision loss in AMD
